name: Unnamed Popup Clicker: Remade!
description: I Remade a game I made over 2 years ago and this is it! This is in early access and will get updated from time to time, but i wanted to get the concept out. This is Popup Clicker, a game I made a while ago but decide to update. It is very basic, all you do is click on popups and hope your CPU doesn't overload.  Please report bugs / Give me suggestions in the comments, as I would love to make this game as fun and bug-free as possible.
